resources.string: Hi, \n So you wanted to learn how to build an android app with no prior coding experience ?\nDon\'t worry, this app might be the perfect start for you in 2018.
Learn from variety of sources.\nI\'m sure this will help the beginners to get started.
Have patience and faith.\nIt takes time but i promise it worth\'s.
Can you believe the application you are viewing, it\'s source can be freely downloaded from GitHub?\nNavigate to the Source Code section for more.
